lines:
1906

25

224 Horth Wayne St.

Angela indiana

sep 21,1911 
My dear Mr. Stearns

I would like to

learno

cs

have you send me ane 
Mundred dollars as soon as 
possible. Because I need 
them to pay my tiction fel 
board and room rent 
and much ablides e.

fien

fel

advance

3.6. Luk.

metadata.abstract: Letter requesting $100 for tuition and room and board fees.
